function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inconsistent use of research evidence in informing decisions","Impact":"Increased risk of ineffective response to public health emergencies","Mitigation":"Promotion of evidence-based decision-making, collaboration between public health expertise and government","Technologies":"Data analytics, decision-support systems, evidence-based policy tools","People":"Governments, decision-makers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Top-down approach to decision-making with political and economic considerations taking precedence over research and health directives","Impact":"Exposure of populations to increased risks","Mitigation":"Promotion of evidence-based decision-making, prioritization of public health expertise, transparency in decision-making","Technologies":"Data analytics, decision-support systems, evidence-based policy tools","People":"Governments, decision-makers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Disruption of health systems and economies","Impact":"Limited capacity to respond to public health emergencies, economic instability","Mitigation":"Investment in health system resilience, economic support measures, pandemic preparedness planning","Technologies":"Health information systems, economic forecasting tools, pandemic response planning tools","People":"Healthcare workers, businesses, communities","Owner":"Governments, businesses, public health organizations"}]}
